alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 4:23PM CDT until March 30 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Rankin County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 423 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Dry Grove, or 9 miles west of Byram, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Jackson around 430 PM CDT. Byram around 435 PM CDT. Richland and Florence around 445 PM CDT. Pearl, Flowood and Monterey around 450 PM CDT. Brandon around 500 PM CDT. Pelahatchie around 515 PM CDT. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
